testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to access detailed information about the badge with the specified ID via an API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request with valid authorization credentials and correct data (id) is sent to the /api/badge/{id}
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/badge/24" path parameters..........................passed * The api user sends a "GET" request and saves the returned response........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success"..passed * The API user verifies the contents of 24, "/store/1/default_images/badges/junior_vendor.png", "course_count", "1", "1", 10, 1625554772, 4, 24, "en", "Junior Vendor" and "Has 1 Class" in the response body data..passed
